channel.title: Carson City County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Carson City County|Nevada|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 7
item.description: I-580/US-395 north approaching Exit 7 - Arrowhead Drive

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 6
item.description: I-580/US-395 North at Exit 6 - College Parkway.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 5
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 5 - US-50 East/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 North for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 east approaching I-580/US-395. Turn right for US-395 south for Minden and Gardnerville. Turn left for Bus. US-395/S Carson St. Continue straight for I-580 North/US-395 North/US-50 East/Reno/Fallon. US-50 joins I-580/US-395 north into Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-580/US-395/Bus. US-395
item.description: US-50 East approaching I-580/US-395/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Use US-395 south for Minden and Gardnerville.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching I-580/US-395
item.description: US-50 East approaching I-580/US-395 in Carson City.

item.title: US-50 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 west. Distance to Jct. SR-28, South Lake Tahoe (CA), and Sacramento (CA).

item.title: End I-580 South at US-395/US-50/Bus. US-395
item.description: End I-580 South at US-395/US-50/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Turn left for Bus. US-395 North/Carson City; right for US-395 South/Minden/Gardnerville. Continue straight for US-50 West/South Lake Tahoe (California).

item.title: End I-580 South at US-50/US-395/Bus. US-395
item.description: End I-580 South at US-50/US-395/Bus. US-395 in Carson City. Use US-395 south for Minden/Gardnerville. Use US-50 West for South Lake Tahoe (California).

item.title: I-580 South Approaching Bus. US-395
item.description: I-580 South Approaching Bus. US-395/Carson Street. I-580 and the freeway ends at Carson St.

item.title: I-580/US-395 South/US-50 West - Carson City
item.description: I-580/US-395 South/US-50 West in Carson City

item.title: I-580 South - Exit 3
item.description: I-580/US-395 South/US-50 West approaching Exit 3 - Fairview Drive.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching I-580/US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching I-580/US-395. Use I-580/US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins I-580/US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. The I-580 shield is not listed on the overhead.

item.title: I-580 North - Exit 38
item.description: I-580 north at Exit 38 - Fairview Drive.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East - Carson City
item.description: First shields on I-580 north in Carson City.

item.title: I-580/US-50/US-395 Freeway Entrance
item.description: I-580 North/US-50 East/US-395 North Freeway Entrance in Carson City. This is the southern beginning of I-580.

item.title: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 - Carson City
item.description: US-395 North at US-50/I-580 in Carson City. Turn left for US-50 West/South Lake Tahoe. Continue straight for Bus. US-395/S. Carson St. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching I-580/US-50
item.description: US-395 North approaching I-580/US-50 in Carson City. Merge right for I-580/US-395 North/US-50 East/Fallon/Reno. I-580 begins here at the US-50/US-395 junction.

item.title: US-50 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-50 east. Distance to Mound House, Jct. SR-341, and Fallon.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East on Exit 39 Offramp. Use left lane for Carson City Downtown; left lane for US-50 east to Dayton and Fallon.

item.title: US-50 East at US-395
item.description: US-50 East at US-395 at the bottom of Spooner Summit in Carson City. US-50 joins US-395 north briefly through Carson City. Turn left for US-395 North/US-50 East; right for US-395 south. Construction is in progress on a new freeway that will terminate at this junction. US-50 east and US-395 north traffic would merge onto the freeway.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 east approaching US-395. Use US-395 south for Minden and Bishop (California). US-50 east joins US-395 north for Carson City and Reno.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 East approaching US-395 in Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East - Carson City
item.description: Entering Carson City - Nevada’s Capital on US-50 east.

item.title: US-50 East - Carson City
item.description: US-50 East - Carson City - State Capital. Carson City is an independent city, and the capitol of Nevada. Instead of the text COUNTY LINE that is typical when entering a new county in Nevada, Carson City lists the text STATE CAPITAL.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-580/US-395 North. Distance to Reno, Susanville (CA), and Alturas (CA).

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 44
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 44 - Alt. US-395 North/Eastlake Blvd.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 43
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 43 - Arrowhead Drive. This is the northern end of the Carson City business loop.

item.title: I-580/US-395 North - Exit 41
item.description: I-580/US-395 North approaching Exit 41 - College Parkway.

item.title: US-395 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on I-580/US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here. I-580 begins here northbound, although it is not listed on the overhead. The first I-580 shield is north of this interchange.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East - Downtown Carson City
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East approaching Exit 39. Use Exit 39 for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East approaching Exit 39 - US-50 East/Dayton/Fallon.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East at Bus. US-395 and Fairview Ave.
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East at Bus. US-395 and Fairview Ave in Carson City. Turn right to continue on US-395 North/US-50 East. Keep straight on Carson St. for Bus. US-395.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East Approaching Bus. US-395 and Fairview Ave.
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East (Carson St.) approaching Bus. US-395 and Fairview Ave. Turn right on Fairview Ave. to continue on US-395 North/US-50 East to Dayton and Reno. Continue north on Carson St. for Bus. US-395 and Downtown (Carson City). The routing of US-395/US-50 along Fairview Ave. is temporary until the Carson City Freeway is completed.

item.title: US-395 North/US-50 East Approaching Fairview Lane
item.description: US-395 North/US-50 East approaching Fairview Lane. Use right lane to continue on US-395/US-50.

item.title: US-395 North at US-50
item.description: US-395 north at US-50 in Carson City. US-50 East joins US-395 North to Fairview Ave.

item.title: US-395 North at US-50
item.description: US-395 north at US-50. Use US-50 west for Lake Tahoe. Use US-50 East/US-395 North for Reno. US-50 East joins US-395 for a short distance north of this intersection. This will be the southern terminus of the Carson City Freeway.

item.title: US-395 North Approaching US-50
item.description: US-395 North approaching US-50 in Carson City.

item.title: US-395 North - Exit 39
item.description: US-395 north at Exit 39 - US-50/Dayton/Fallon. Continue north on US-395 for Reno. The US-50/US-395 split ends here.

item.title: US-50 East Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 east approaching US-395. Use US-395 south for Minden and Bishop (California). US-50 east joins US-395 north for Carson City and Reno.

item.title: US-395 South/US-50 West at US-50 West
item.description: US-395 South/US-50 west at US-50/US-395 split. US-50 turns west towards Lake Tahoe, and Spooner Summit. US-395 continues south to Minden.

item.title: US-395 South/US-50 West - Exit 38
item.description: US-395 South/US-50 west at Exit 38 - Fairview Drive. This is the current southern end of the Carson City Bypass. Traffic is temporarily routed onto Fairview Drive west to the former route of US-395.

item.title: US-395 South/US-50 West Approaching Exit 38
item.description: US-395 South/US-50 west approaching Exit 38 - Fairview Drive. The Carson City Bypass currently ends here, so all Minden and South Lake Tahoe bound traffic must exit here.

item.title: US-395 South/US-50 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 South/US-50 west along the Carson City Bypass. Distance to Fairview Drive, which is the current end of the Carson City Bypass.

item.title: US-50 West at US-395/US-50 Onramp
item.description: US-50 West at US-395 South/US-50 West onramp for the Carson City Bypass.

item.title: US-50 West at US-395 North
item.description: US-50 west at US-395 north onramp.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-50 West Approaching US-395
item.description: US-50 west approaching US-395. Use US-395 north for Reno. US-50 west joins US-395 south for Minden and South Lake Tahoe (CA). Continue on William St. for Downtown Carson City.

item.title: US-50 East at US-395
item.description: US-50 East at US-395 at the bottom of Spooner Summit in Carson City. US-50 joins US-395 north briefly through Carson City. Turn left for US-395 North/US-50 East; right for US-395 south. Construction is in progress on a new freeway that will terminate at this junction. US-50 east and US-395 north traffic would merge onto the freeway.
